questions.question: Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This member of the Worst Generation, known for their 'Room' ability and Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit, is a notorious pirate and surgeon. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
